TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BasicHttpBinding extends System.ServiceModel.HttpBindingBase implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences
type BasicHttpBinding = class inherit HttpBindingBase interface IBindingRuntimePreferences

summary.span: 代表繫結，Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務可使用該繫結設定並公開能與 ASMX Web 服務和用戶端，以及其他符合 WS-I Basic Profile 1.1 的服務進行通訊的端點。

span.span: Represents a binding that a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service can use to configure and expose endpoints that are able to communicate with ASMX-based Web services and clients and other services that conform to the WS-I Basic Profile 1.1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 HTTP 做為傳送 SOAP 1.1 訊息的傳輸。The uses HTTP as the transport for sending SOAP 1.1 messages. 服務可使用這個繫結公開符合 WS-I BP 1.1 的端點，例如 ASMX 用戶端存取的端點。A service can use this binding to expose endpoints that conform to WS-I BP 1.1, such as those that ASMX clients access. 同樣地，用戶端可以使用與公開符合 WS-I 的端點的服務進行通訊-我 BP 1.1，例如 ASMX Web 服務或與設定的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務。Similarly, a client can use the to communicate with services exposing endpoints that conform to WS-I BP 1.1, such as ASMX Web services or Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) services configured with the . 安全性預設是關閉的，但是可以在 建構函式中透過將 設為非 的值來新增。Security is turned off by default, but can be added setting the to a value other than in the constructor. 根據預設，它使用「文字」訊息編碼和 UTF-8 文字編碼。It uses a "Text" message encoding and UTF-8 text encoding by default. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何在應用程式組態檔中設定 。The following example shows how to configure the in an application configuration file. 下列範例會示範如何以程式設計的方式設定 。The following example shows how to programmatically configure . [!code-csharp[S_UEBasicHttpBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uebasichttpbinding/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEBasicHttpBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uebasichttpbinding/vb/service.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用之 的預設值為 ，這個值表示 SOAP 訊息並不安全，而且用戶端也尚未經過驗證。The default value of used is , which specifies that the SOAP message is not secured and the client is not authenticated. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEBasicHttpBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uebasichttpbinding/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_UEBasicHttpBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uebasichttpbinding/vb/service.vb#2)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a binding specified by its configuration name.

remarks.format: ## Examples 這個範例會使用組態名稱 指定的繫結初始化新 `BasicBinding` 類別。This example initializes a new class with a binding specified by the configuration name `BasicBinding`. 您必須在服務的組態檔中建立繫結區段。You must create a bindings section in the service's configuration file. [!code-csharp[S_UEBasicHttpBinding#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uebasichttpbinding/cs/snippets.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UEBasicHttpBinding#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uebasichttpbinding/vb/snippets.vb#5)] 然後在呼叫 建構函式時，指定繫結組態的名稱。Then the name of the binding configuration is specified in the call to the constructor. summary.span: 建立並傳回包含在目前繫結中繫結項目的已排序集合。

span.span: The that contains the ordered stack of binding elements described by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結項目的順序很重要。The order of the binding elements is important. 它會反映建構及堆疊通訊協定和傳輸通道的順序。It reflects the order in which the protocol and transport channels are constructed and stacked. 這個繫結項目的集合是新的集合，可以修改後用於建立 。This collection of binding elements is a new collection and can be modified and then used to create a . ## Examples 下列範例會在目前繫結中建立繫結項目的已排序集合。The following example creates an ordered collection of the binding elements in the current binding.
